mapper.update: CREATE TABLE boardtbl ( IDX INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, SUBJECT VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, CONTENT TEXT NOT NULL, POSTDATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, LIKES INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, VIEWS INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, membertbl_ID varchar(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (membertbl_ID) REFERENCES membertbl (ID) );
mapper.insert: insert into boardtbl (SUBJECT, CONTENT, POSTDATE, LIKES, VIEWS, membertbl_ID) values (#{subject}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0, #{membertbl_id})
mapper.select: select * from boardtbl where SUBJECT like '%'||#{subject}||'%'
select idx, content, name, postdate from commenttbl join membertbl on commenttbl.membertbl_id = membertbl.id where boardtbl_IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: update boardtbl set views = views+1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select IDX, SUBJECT, CONTENT, POSTDATE, LIKES, VIEWS, membertbl_ID, NAME, ADMIN from boardtbl join membertbl on boardtbl.membertbl_id = membertbl.id where IDX = #{idx}
select IDX, SUBJECT, CONTENT, POSTDATE, LIKES, VIEWS, membertbl_ID, NAME, ADMIN from boardtbl join membertbl on boardtbl.membertbl_id = membertbl.id
select id from liketbl join membertbl on liketbl.membertbl_id = membertbl.id where boardtbl_idx = #{idx} and id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into imagetbl (ORIGINIMAGENAME, IMAGENAME, IMAGEPATH, boardtbl_IDX) values (#{originImageName}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath}, #{boardtbl_idx})
